title: Whistle-Blower, Iran Sanctions & 2020
itunes:title: Whistle-Blower, Iran Sanctions & 2020
description:
Kevin spoke with Al Weaver, National Political Reporter at the Hill, and Eli Yokley, Political reporter for Morning Consult.

They discussed  a whistle-blower who has raised questions about Trump’s dealings with Ukraine, Trump announcing sanctions on Iran, and the 2020 Presidential Election.

Kevin also spoke with Morgan Ortagus, State Department Spokeswoman.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
